table_description: Information about job descriptions, including ID, service details, status, and timestamps.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the job.

columns.name: serviceId
columns.description: The ID of the service associated with the job.

columns.name: startCommand
columns.description: The start command for the job.

columns.name: planId
columns.description: The ID of the plan associated with the job.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the job (e.g., running, completed).

columns.name: createdAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the job was created.

columns.name: startedAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the job started.

columns.name: finishedAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the job finished.
